The outdoor riding ring is 85x180 w/sand footing, you will also find a round pen, 4 individual paddocks, 3 lg grass fields and 2 sm grass paddocks.  Detached garage/shop for the handyman or to store the toys.  You can view your kingdom from the wrap around deck where the fields, barn and riding arena can easily be viewed.  With 4 bdrms & 2baths this home will accommodate the family & visitors alike.  Heat is supplied via pellet stove w/electric backup. Nice quiet area with easy access to trails.
Realtor Remarks: 24 hours notice appreciated. Appointments only please. Vendor will be home.
